conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquids and how they interact with the obstacles
Liquid from A is light blue
Liquid from A flows down and encounters the green block
Liquid from A diverts to the left, eventually reaching container E
Liquid from B flows down, meeting the gray block
Liquid from B diverts right and combines with the flow from C
Liquid from C flows down and merges with the yellow liquid from B
Combined liquids from B and C hit the black block and flow right into container G
Liquid from D flows straight down
Liquid from D encounters the black block, diverting it into container G
Container E collects the light blue liquid from A
Container G collects the yellow and orange liquids from B and C, and the pink liquid from D
Final Answer: E collects light blue; G collects yellow, orange, pink
